aboutText: Hi everyone, my name is Furkan. I worked freelance and full-time front-end developer for 3 years. In the first steps my career, I used HTML, CSS ,JS. Then I develop projects with React, Next.js, Vue.js. Same time I develop Mobile Apps with React Native
mobileApplicationDescription: I can develop app for Android and IOS device with React Native
webAppDevelopDescription: I can develop web sites and web apps with React, Vue.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS
